theft.question:
Did I intentionally fail to pay my debts? 

This examination concerns your intention, specifically whether you deliberately neglected or omitted paying what was owed to others, in violation of the principle of justice. This is a serious matter that requires careful reflection on your thoughts, words, and actions. In this case, failing to pay debts constitutes a sin against others through omission, specifically theft.

apostasy.question: Have you explicitly rejected the existence of God, either internally through private doubts or to others in conversations about faith?
apostasy.description: Denying God's existence after having been baptized apostasy is one of the gravest sins possible because it is declaring the Author of Life and Source of all being to be non-existent, which directly contradicts both reason and divine revelation.

extracted_data_phrases: either through your thoughts or conversations with others
apostasy.question: Have you ever explicitly rejected God's existence, either through your thoughts or conversations with others?
apostasy.description: Denying God's existence after having been baptized apostasy is one of the gravest sins possible because it is declaring the Author of Life and Source of all being to be non-existent, which directly contradicts both reason and divine revelation.

apostasy.description: Denying God's existence after having been baptized apostasy is one of the gravest sins possible because it is declaring the Author of Life and Source of all being to be non-existent, which directly contradicts both reason and divine revelation.

impiety.question: Did you fail to show reverence for Most Blessed Sacrament, especially when participating in communal activities or personal devotions?
impiety.description: This sin is in failing to show proper reverence demonstrates a lack of faith, respect, and proper worship due to God.

impiety.question: Did I fail to show reverence for Most Blessed Sacrament when participating in community events or volunteering?
impiety.description: This sin is in failing to show proper reverence demonstrates a lack of faith, respect, and proper worship due to God.

impiety.question: Did you fail to always show reverence for Most Blessed Sacrament in your daily life, especially during times of great stress or when you were preoccupied with other activities?
impiety.description: This sin is in failing to show proper reverence demonstrates a lack of faith, respect, and proper worship due to God.
